entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 16.

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
